item.title: Use git aliases
item.description: We all work with some kind of version control systems, and if you work with git as I do, you should know how it works and what it can do for you really well. One of the features which can improve our development workflow are git aliases. And here I’m presenting to you a very good git config with nice aliases (and other git configurations) which will speed up your typing when using git.
